mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectBskWishlst Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ WISHLST_SN , MALL_ID , LANG_CD , MBR_NO , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM BSK_WISHLST WHERE 1 = 1 AND WISHLST_SN = #{wishlstSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteBskWishlst Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM BSK_WISHLST WHERE 1 = 1 AND WISHLST_SN = #{wishlstSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
